LDM R0,0
LDM R1,1
LDM R2,2
LDM R3,3
LDM R4,4
LDM R5,5
LDM R6,6
LDM R7,7
PUSH  R1	 M[0] = 1
POP  R7		 R7 = 1
LDD  R6, 4000	 R6 = 1
STD R6, 3998	 M[3998] = 1

0000000000010000

1000000000100000			Push R1 
0000000000000000

1000100011100000			POP  R7

1000000011100000			Push R7  hazard
